attributes.action: We condemn all instances of sectarian behaviour by Members of Parliament
attributes.additional_details: An example of such sectarian behaviour: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-northern-ireland-36771800
attributes.background: Sectarian behaviour by politicians during the Summer marching season is commonplace and has become normalised in the North of Ireland. The British parliament seems unaware of the sectarian behaviour of some of its own members and such behaviour should  be condemned.
